about_the_game:
Demo Version Features:

This demo includes all core mechanics of Cave of Horrors but is set in a unique, smaller map. Experience the core exploration, creature encounters, and puzzles without diving deep into the full game's lore.

Uncover the secrets of the cave or face your fate.

In this thrilling adventure, you step into the shoes of a death row inmate given one last chance to avoid execution. Your task? To explore the uncharted depths of a perilous cave and document its mysteries. This is no ordinary cave—it's teeming with bizarre creatures, unusual plants, and mysterious ores, each with unique properties waiting to be discovered.

Explore and Document

Your primary goal is to investigate every nook and cranny of the cave, leaving no stone unturned. The cave is a labyrinthine ecosystem brimming with:

Monsters: Each with unique behaviors and vulnerabilities. Use your wits to understand how different ores affect them and log every detail.

Plants: Discover various plants, each with distinctive effects when consumed. Some might enhance your abilities, others could provide essential clues, but all are crucial to your survival and documentation.

Ores: Collect ores that possess special properties when thrown. These ores can create strategic advantages against monsters or help solve intricate puzzles.

Points of Interest: Every hidden corner, ancient relic, and mysterious artifact must be thoroughly explored and recorded.

Puzzle Solving: The cave is riddled with puzzles that guard its secrets. Use your intellect and the tools at your disposal to unlock these mysteries and progress further.

Master the art of survival as you delve deeper into the cave's enigmatic environment. Your logbook isn't just a record—it's your lifeline. Accurately noting how ores interact with monsters and the effects of plants can mean the difference between life and death.

name: Cave Of Horrors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Explore and discover the secrets of a non-linear cave. Document everything you find in your logbook. You cannot return unless you find every single information about every monster, plant, ore and point of interest.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
